name: The Grim Repair
description:
Come on down to The Grim Repair! The most deathly efficient auto-repair service in your area!

CARS? We know 'em.
TYRES? We got 'em.
BRAKES? We'll fix 'em.

And for the next two weeks only, we're offering a free wash, wax, and date-of-death estimation with every full vehicle service!

Controls:

  • W/S/A/D : Move
  • Arrow Keys : Camera
  • E: Grab / Throw
  • Space : Rotate

Credits:

Made in 2 days as part of Global Game Jam 2020 -- unfinished.

  • Liam de Valmency  (Design/Code/Art)
  • Bogdan Vera (Music)
